doc.title: Signatories | Fight For 1.5! - Fridays For Future - Sign our Promise and join an action!
doc.excerpt: 5 years since commiting to 1.5 degrees Celsius with the Paris Agreement but too little has been done. We need action. We need you to #FightFor1Point5, sign our Promise and join our local worldwide actions against climate change.

main.head: PRomise signatoires
HOME | About | Promise | actions | Webinars | Share
main.p: These are the groups and individuals that have signed the #FightFor1Point5 Promise. Want to add your name to the list?
